tool_description: Calculates comprehensive cost estimates for maintenance work orders including labor, parts, equipment, and overhead costs.

work_order_ids.description: Work order IDs to estimate costs for

labor_rate_override.description: Override hourly labor rate if different from standard

include_overhead.description: Whether to include facility and administrative overhead costs

overhead_percentage.description: Overhead percentage to apply to direct costs

include_downtime_costs.description: Whether to include vehicle downtime opportunity costs

error_messages: Work orders not found: One or more work_order_ids do not exist.
Invalid labor rate: labor_rate_override must be a positive number.
Invalid overhead percentage: overhead_percentage must be between 0 and 100.
Cost calculation error: Unable to calculate costs due to missing pricing data.
usage: Provide work_order_ids and optionally customize cost parameters. Returns detailed cost breakdowns and total estimates for maintenance work.

total_estimated_cost.description: Total estimated cost for all work orders

cost_breakdown_by_order.description: Individual cost breakdowns for each work order
